Simulations/API

cxt.simulation

cxt.simulation.create_sawtooth_demogaphy_object(Ne=20000, magnitue=4)[source]
cxt.simulation.generate_data(i, pivot_A=0, pivot_B=1, ts_simulation_func=None)[source]
cxt.simulation.process_batches(num_samples: int, start_batch: int, batch_size: int, num_processes: int, output_dir: str, pivot_A: int, pivot_B: int, ts_simulation_func: callable) → None[source]

Process data in batches using multiprocessing and save the results.

Parameters:

  • num_samples (int) – Total number of samples to process.

  • start_batch (int) – The starting batch index.

  • batch_size (int) – The number of samples per batch.

  • num_processes (int) – The number of processes to use for multiprocessing.

  • output_dir (str) – The directory where the output batches will be saved.

  • pivot_A (int, optional) – The first pivot index for processing, by default 0.

  • pivot_B (int, optional) – The second pivot index for processing, by default 1.

  • ts_simulation_func (callable) – The simulation function to generate tree sequence data.

Return type:

None

cxt.simulation.save_batch(data, idx, output_dir)[source]
